title: Github Forensics
description: A client has requested assistance after a network compromise caused a full outage. Preliminary forensic analysis shows the attack originated from a single user account, indicating a potential insider threat. Investigate the incident to identify the insider and determine the actions taken during the attack. You have been given the compromised user's github profile - https://github.com/EMarseille99 One of the account's followers is based in Kanpar. Can you find their linkedin profile?
hints: Have a look at their followers
